Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at 59th/Emerald
ShortDescription: #59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Halsted, 55th, Union, and 59th, due to fire department activity near 59th/Emerald.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Halsted, 55th, Union, and 59th, then resume their normal route, due to fire department activity near 59th/Emerald.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Racine
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Racine due to a signal problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Racine due to a signal problem. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#7 Harrison

#8 Halsted

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
